What it is: Confronts a symbolic version of yourself that embodies your most rejected traits.
How to use it: Ask AI to generate a symbolic confrontation between you and your least acceptable self.
What it changes: Reintegrates rejected traits through mythic conflict.

What it is: Analyzes symbolic meaning in recurring delays, failures, or inaction.
How to use it: Describe repeated blockage. Ask AI to assign symbolic meaning to delay.

What it is: Calls upon symbolic ancestors—real or imagined—to empower your present action.
How to use it: Name your lineage. Ask AI to describe symbolic figures from that history guiding your path.
What it changes: Strengthens agency by mythically rooting identity.

What it is: Models your most dangerous habits as symbolic seducers.
How to use it: List addictive or destructive impulses. Ask AI to mythologize each as a temptress or trap.
What it changes: Enables ritual resistance through narrative archetypes.

What it is: Determines which symbolic season your inner world is in.
How to use it: Describe your current mindset. Ask AI to align it to a mythic season with meaning.
What it changes: Creates awareness of internal cycles and timing.

What it is: Designs mythic deterrents against falling back into old patterns.
How to use it: State a past relapse. Ask AI to encode symbolic defense mechanisms for future resistance.

What it is: Analyzes what a lack of response or feeling truly means symbolically.
How to use it: Describe emotional or interpersonal silence. Ask AI to decode its mythic function.
What it changes: Finds purpose in absence and non-expression.

What it is: Manifests the part of your ego that must be symbolically sacrificed.
How to use it: Ask AI to build an effigy of your ego-structure that is no longer serving.
What it changes: Facilitates psychic rebirth through symbolized offering.

What it is: Forecasts where your identity will collapse unless a new myth emerges.
How to use it: Describe your trajectory. Ask AI to predict symbolic collapse points and propose mythic buffers.
What it changes: Prepares identity for evolution through mythic foresight.

What it is: Creates a symbolic guardian who protects your energy and sacred space.
How to use it: Describe your need for protection. Ask AI to design a guardian with symbolic strength.
What it changes: Reclaims agency by constructing mythic defense systems.
